title: Ep.22: Super Bowl Giveaway, Pro Bowl, Israel Adesanya, Jon Jones, Joe Vs Griffin, and Much More!
description: If the Bengals win the Super Bowl, you will have a chance to win a Joe Burrow jersey. If they win and Jamarr Chase has over 100 receiving yards we will be giving away a Jamarr Chase jersey as well. Tune in to find out more!
dc:creator: Griffin Proctor & Joe Jokonya
itunes:summary: If the Bengals win the Super Bowl, you will have a chance to win a Joe Burrow jersey. If they win and Jamarr Chase has over 100 receiving yards we will be giving away a Jamarr Chase jersey as well. Tune in to find out more!
